text: Ernst Heinrich Meier (17 May 1813 in Bückeburg – 2 March 1866 in Tübingen) was a German Orientalist. He published an Indian play, Sakuntala or the Lost Ring. He also published a collection of German folk songs. ==References== Category:1813 births Category:1866 deaths Category:Writers from Baden- Württemberg
title: Ernst Heinrich Meier
